name: IMPOSSIBLE SLASHER !
description:
Defeat as many enemies as you can and Unlock different characters with different abilities.

4 DIFFERENT PLAYABLE CHARACTERS.

Various Types of Enemies with different attacks and abilities.

Extra-ordinary game music.

Retro inspired 2D Platformer game.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

If the response comes out to be good , I'll be adding more stuff to the game like a story line that i have planned out , different playable characters and enemy types as well as different maps . So please support the game if possible.

Special Thanks to Luiz Melo for his amazing character assets. Make sure to check his stuff out . (luizmelo.itch.io)
